meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be cast.
meanings.sent1: The castability of the metal made it perfect for creating intricate designs.
meanings.sent2: The castability of the clay allowed the artist to mold it into various shapes.
meanings.sent3: The castability of the rubber duck made it the star of the bathtub.
meanings.sent4: Her castability in the school play was like a shining beacon of talent.
meanings.sent5: The castability of the fishing rod made it easy for beginners to learn how to cast.

meanings.sent1: The castability of the material determined its usefulness in the manufacturing process.
meanings.sent2: The sculptor admired the castability of the bronze for creating detailed statues.
meanings.sent3: The castability of the pancake batter surprised everyone when it formed perfect circles on the griddle.
meanings.sent4: His castability in adapting to new situations was truly impressive.
meanings.sent5: The castability of the actor in different roles showcased his versatility on stage.
